column2: The AI-Assisted Engineering Trainer will be responsible for guiding our team of software developers in understanding and implementing the latest developments in Generative AI and AI-assisted coding tools       The successful candidate will have a strong background in AI/ML, experience with software development, and a passion for coaching/education     They will work closely with our development team to recommend and implement tools, methodologies, and processes that will enhance our efficiency and productivity               Responsibilities:                   AI Educational Training:    Develop and deliver training programs to help our software developers understand the practical applications of Generative AI and other AI trends.                   AI Tool Implementation:    Research, recommend, and help implement AI-assisted coding platforms to enhance the efficiency of our software development team.                   Process Development:    Create methodologies and processes that will guide the use of AI tools within the development team.                   Staying Current:    Keep abreast of the latest developments in AI, machine learning, and software development tools.                   Collaboration:    Work closely with the development team and our technology and delivery leadership to understand their needs and challenges, and tailor our strategies accordingly.                 Qualifications:                   Education:    Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.                   Experience:    At least 5 years of experience in an AI/ML role, with a recent focus on Generative AI. Prior experience in a software development role would be beneficial.                 Skills:                 In-depth understanding of Generative AI and its practical applications                 Familiarity with AI-assisted coding platforms such as Kite, Codota, and GitHub Copilot             Experience with one of the following AutoML tools:             Google Cloud AutoML                 Amazon SageMaker Autopilot                 Azure Machine Learning AutoML                 Strong communication and teaching skills                 Ability to translate complex AI concepts into practical knowledge for non-AI experts                 Familiarity with software development processes and methodologies                 Ability to work in a multicultural and remote team                 Certifications:               It s expected that the candidate will have a certifications in AI/ML from recognized bodies or platforms will be an added advantage. While none of these is necessary, some form of certification will be required that is similar to:                TensorFlow Developer Certificate                 Google Cloud - Professional Data Engineer                 IBM AI Engineering Professional Certificate                 Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate                 AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialty                 NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute (DLI) Certifications                 Stanford University - Machine Learning on Coursera                 edX Professional Certificate in Deep Learning                 Advanced AI: Deep Reinforcement Learning in Python                 Deep Learning Specialization by Andrew Ng

column2: Work with the other Coaches to streamline all FAT s training material and curriculums including STEM education appropriately in each program. Support Champion to execute the pilot model of Girls MakerSpace. column2: Sales / Process Trainer and Coach  -  USA ShiftBangalore, KA, IndiaAbout Company:ZaranTech is a USA based Global e - learning Company. We provide focused Individual and Corporate training in Niche IT technologies. Our Sr. expert trainers have 10+ years of real - time experience in the fast paced world of Information Technology. We provide Role - based training as compared to Product based training methodology. Most of our training programs are delivered Online and we provide Instructor Led and Self - Paced modes of training.Job Profile:We are looking for a Sr. level experienced person who can learn about our e - learning product and all about our USP and train our on floor Sales guys on How to make and Improve Sales and follow the Process of making Sales. This person will also be responsible to daily train the Sales Execs about the Product knowledge of the training and certification programs we offer. This person will directly work with the QA person we have on floor who monitors all sales calls.     Job Description     1. Trains new hires in Sales process and Sales skill2. Trains existing Sales executives on the floor about the Sales process and coaches them for Sales tips and techniques.     3. Develops individual coaching plan for each executive on the floor to make them better in Sales.4. Monitor calls and provides suggestions on the Daily basis to the existing Sales executives on the floor.5. Improves training effectiveness by developing new approaches and techniques; making support readily available; integrating support with routine job functions.     Requirements:     1. Minimum 4 to 10 years of experience in Sales & Marketing training.     2. Must have good Sales Coaching skills and Excellent English communication skills.     3. Must have excellent Process training.4. Must be willing to work in Night shifts which will be 9:30 PM - 6:30 AM IST.     5. Ability to take sales and product training.Location: Domlur, BangaloreCTC: As per market and company standards and Very attractive Incentives. As much as double your Salary.Benefits that you get:1. Salary directly deposited to Bank account     2. You earn 1.5 days of vacation every month3. Travel Allowance depended on your profile4. OverTime 1.5 times paid upon Approval5. Comp off benefits     6. Attractive Incentives and Commissions     7. PF benefits with 100% Employer matching     8. Holidays followed as per USA calendar     9. Transportation  - Pick  - up and Drop - off facility at no cost for Approved employees     10. Great Referral bonus program     11. Learn many new technologies and enhance your skills     12. column2: We seek a highly motivated, dedicated candidate with experience in conducting training who is passionate about improving knowledge about Sexual Reproductive Health (SRH)       The successful candidate will play a critical role in conducting training programs and advocating for improved SRH services     If you have a background in training and a strong commitment to womens health, we encourage you to apply              Qualifications Experience:             (The areas of knowledge and expertise that matter most for this role)             We are looking for female facilitators.          The candidate should be based out of Bengaluru, Karnataka or should be willing to move to Bengaluru.         The candidate will be expected to the factory where the training has to be conducted 5-6 times a week.         Bachelors or Masters degree in Public Health, Gender Studies, Social Work, or a related field.         Proven experience in conducting or facilitating SRH training.          Preference will be given to candidates who have at least 2 years of experience in facilitating SRH training.         Excellent communication, training, and interpersonal skills.         Strong organizational and project management abilities.         Proficiency in relevant computer skills like experience in Microsoft Word, Microsoft Presentation, PDF.         Ability to work independently and as part of a team.          Flexibility to travel to project sites and communities as required.          Ability to read, write and converse in Kannada English.          Ability to speak in Hindi will be an advantage.                 Roles Responsibilities:           (Areas that will play to your strength and all the responsibilities we will trust you with)           Training and Capacity Building:            The SRH trainer will be trained for 2-3 weeks on various SRH issues (for example: menstruation, contraception, pregnancy etc.) by an expert organisation. The trainer will be expected to deliver training as per the training manual/curriculum.          The SRH trainer has to conduct training for 2-3 hours (apart from this, there might be 1-2 hours of travel time every day from Monday - Saturday). The trainer will address SRH issues for 5-6 groups of 10-12 female garment workers each. The training will be conducted for about 4-5 months.          The trainer will be expected to help and develop a field plan with support from the GBL field team.          Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of training and inform the GBL team about participants progress.                  Stakeholder management:             Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders and help the team seek permission to conduct SRH training and data collection.          Raise awareness about SRH issues and promote the importance of comprehensive SRH care within the female labour force.                    Report Writing and Documentation:             Ensuring training documentation is complete and well-maintained, including designing, maintaining, and tracking field reports in Google documents.         Maintain accurate records of training materials and program evaluations.                               Community Engagement:             Build strong relationships with female labourers, clinic healthcare workers, and other stakeholders to ensure their active participation in research and training activities.          Provide support and guidance to address individual SRH concerns and queries.                 What should you be comfortable with           A dynamic environment with competing priorities.         Working in a team with shared responsibilities.         Independently coordinating with coworkers to accomplish goals.         Being resourceful in new environments and scenarios.         Problem-solving in high-pressure environments.         Adapting your approach, being focused on the problem and not being stuck to one idea or way of solving a problem.
column11: Training, Administration, Organizational development, Project management, Data collection, Healthcare, Stakeholder management, microsoft

column2: As a strategic technical trainer in an EV auto manufacturing organization, your role is pivotal in building the knowledge and skills required to drive the successful production of electric vehicles in a rapidly evolving industry landscape.    Technical Expertise : You must have a deep understanding of electric vehicle technology, including battery systems, electric motors, power electronics, and charging infrastructure. Your knowledge should encompass both theoretical principles and practical applications in manufacturing. Training Development : Develop comprehensive training programs tailored to various roles within the organization, such as assembly line workers, technicians, engineers, and management. These programs should cover everything from basic EV principles to advanced manufacturing techniques specific to electric vehicles. Instructional Design : Create engaging and effective learning materials, including presentations, manuals, videos, and hands-on activities. Utilize instructional design principles to ensure that training content is accessible, interactive, and conducive to learning. Hands-On Training : Provide hands-on training experiences in real or simulated manufacturing environments. This could involve setting up mock assembly lines, conducting equipment demonstrations, and facilitating troubleshooting exercises to reinforce learning. Performance Evaluation : Develop mechanisms to assess the effectiveness of training programs and the competency of trainees. This might include quizzes, practical assessments, and feedback mechanisms to continuously improve training content and delivery. Continuous Learning : Stay updated on the latest advancements in electric vehicle technology and manufacturing processes. Incorporate new knowledge and best practices into training programs to ensure that employees are equipped with the most relevant skills. Cross-Functional Collaboration : Work closely with other departments, such as engineering, quality assurance, and production, to align training initiatives with organizational goals and priorities. Collaborate with subject matter experts to ensure that training content reflects industry standards and best practices. Change Management : Support organizational change initiatives related to the adoption of electric vehicle technology. Help employees transition smoothly by providing targeted training and resources to address any skills gaps or resistance to change. Preferred candidate profile:   Educational Background : A bachelor's degree in engineering, preferably in a field related to automotive engineering, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, or industrial engineering, is often required. Advanced degrees or certifications in education, instructional design, or training development can be beneficial. Expertise in Electric Vehicle Technology : In-depth knowledge of electric vehicle technology, including battery systems, electric motors, power electronics, charging infrastructure, and vehicle systems integration, is essential. This expertise can be gained through formal education, specialized training programs, or hands-on experience in the automotive industry. Training and Instructional Design Skills : Proficiency in instructional design principles, curriculum development, and adult learning theories is crucial for designing effective training programs. Experience with learning management systems (LMS), e-learning authoring tools, and multimedia content creation platforms can also be advantageous. Communication and Presentation Skills : Strong verbal and written communication skills are necessary for delivering engaging training sessions and creating clear, concise training materials. The ability to adapt your communication style to different audiences, from production line workers to senior executives, is important. Hands-On Experience : Practical experience in automotive manufacturing, preferably in electric vehicle production or related fields, provides valuable insights into manufacturing processes, quality standards, and safety regulations. Hands-on experience with electric vehicle components and systems enhances credibility as a trainer. Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills : The ability to analyze training needs, identify performance gaps, and develop targeted solutions is essential. Strong problem-solving skills enable you to address challenges in training delivery, content development, and performance evaluation effectively. Project Management Abilities : Capabilities in project management, including planning, organizing, and executing training initiatives within budget and timeline constraints, are beneficial. Experience managing cross-functional teams and coordinating with stakeholders adds value to training program implementation. Continuous Learning Mindset : The field of electric vehicle technology is rapidly evolving, so a commitment to continuous learning and staying updated on industry trends, technological advancements, and best practices is essential for maintaining relevance as a trainer. Interpersonal Skills and Leadership Qualities : Building rapport with trainees, fostering a positive learning environment, and providing constructive feedback are key aspects of effective training delivery. Leadership qualities such as empathy, adaptability, and resilience help you inspire and motivate trainees to excel. Perks and benefits   Not a constraint for the right candidate
column11: Electric Vehicle Technology, Instructional Design, EV, Power electronics, battery Systems, Electric Motots

column2: What you'll be doing. The Sr. Analyst of Learning & Development (L&D) Operations is a key player in learning transformation. The ideal candidate for this role is an effective communicator, has strong project management skills, and is an expert in Excel, Google Sheets, and PowerPoint or Google Slides to support the data analytics and reporting aspects of this role. This position: Data analysis, reporting, forecasting and demand planning.  Supports reporting, enrollments, scheduling and communications for large Verizon Business training programs. column2: Role & responsibilities  :   Curriculum Development : Designing and developing training materials, including presentations, exercises, and projects, to effectively teach Python concepts to learners with varying levels of experience. Instruction Delivery : Conducting training sessions, workshops, or classes either in-person or virtually, where they explain Python syntax, best practices, libraries, and frameworks. They may use a variety of teaching methods, such as lectures, demonstrations, and hands-on exercises. Customization : Tailoring training programs to meet the specific needs and goals of the audience, which may include beginners, intermediate learners, or professionals seeking to enhance their skills in specific Python domains like web development, data analysis, or machine learning. Assessment and Feedback : Evaluating learners' progress through quizzes, assignments, or practical projects, and providing constructive feedback to help them improve their understanding and proficiency in Python programming. Support and Guidance : Offering assistance and guidance to learners as they encounter challenges or questions during the training process. This may involve troubleshooting code, clarifying concepts, or suggesting resources for further study. Staying Updated : Keeping abreast of developments in the Python ecosystem, including new language features, libraries, and tools, to ensure that training content remains relevant and up-to-date. Collaboration : Collaborating with other trainers, instructors, or subject matter experts to continuously improve training materials and methodologies based on feedback and emerging industry trends. Documentation : Documenting training materials, lesson plans, and resources for future reference and for use by other trainers or learners. Professional Development : Engaging in continuous learning and professional development activities to enhance their own expertise in Python programming and instructional techniques. Communication : Communicating effectively with learners, colleagues, and stakeholders to ensure clarity of instruction, alignment of objectives, and successful outcomes from the training program. Contact: Phone No= 9842433384/9842488828

column2: At Skillsoft, we propel organizations and people to grow together through transformative learning experiences We believe every team member has the potential to be AMAZING Join us in our quest to transform learning and help individuals unleash their edge OVERVIEW : As a trainer within Global Knowledge your primary role will be to represent Skillsoft ILT whilst delivering high quality education in accordance with vendor-specification, and to the quality standards documented in Skillsoft / Global Knowledge's quality procedures A trainer will also provide sales support where necessary, keep abreast of technology and industry changes and feedback delegate's sales leads in a timely fashion When not on platform delivering trainers will work with sales and product management, providing sales support and customer engagement, respond to all operational, sales and customer requests within allotted time-scale and attend, where necessary vendor TTTs and be prepared to redeliver to all FTE trainers as and when required OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS:  To be qualified and authorised to deliver assigned training courses prior to first delivery, ensuring the appropriate vendor process is followed To deliver training courses as specified by the course vendor and in consultation with designated scheduling manager. To deliver training courses to the required quality standards as detailed in Global Knowledge's quality procedures To adhere to vendor-specific requirements including but not limited to obtain / renew certificates and following required examination and invigilation guidelines. To pursue agreed development plans and ensure that preparation time and team teaches are utilised to achieve these plans.  To attain the required standards in transfer of technical skills and delivery techniques as assessed in team teaches. To be prepared to deliver courses at all Global Knowledge centres and customer sites when required. To keep abreast of industry and vendor technology, exam and certification guidelines, distributing information to colleagues where applicable. To provide sales support in the form of delegate leads and customer visits. To respond within given time-scales to all operational requests for contact, information and customer enquires. To manage the classroom and minimise delegate disruption and dissatisfaction. To work closely with the designated scheduling manager to ensure that trainer utilisation meets or exceeds the company requirements. To adopt and display the SKS attitude demonstrating a can do and positive attitude at all times. To establish, build and maintain positive relationships and communication channels with all operational team members. To perform any other duties as deemed necessary to support the growth and goals of Global Knowledge. This is not intended to be a full definition of duties and you will be expected to assist in such duties as may be required SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:  Essential Exam Passes in AZ104, AZ305, AZ500, AZ900, this is in their MCT Transcript MCT - Microsoft Certified Trainer Experience delivering training events PERSON SPECIFICATION : You will have excellent communication and presentation skills; the ability to take responsibility and be decisive;  the ability to work within a team;  effective planning and organisational skills; project management skills; the ability to work under pressure and to deadlines;  a commitment to keep up-to-date with IT trends and developments

Decision making and organizational skills. What we are offering: Remote Freedom, Your Way:  At VeriPark we believe in the power of talent, no matter where it resides. Design your ideal workspace and achieve the perfect work-life balance. Performance-Linked Bonus:  Your hard work doesn't go unnoticed! Enjoy a performance-linked bonus as a testament to your dedication! Rewards Beyond the Job:  Enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including Remote Work Support, Health Insurance, Care Program, and Online Psychological Support. We care you! Birthday Leave, Because You Matter:  We value your special moments! Take the day off on your birthday and treat yourself. Global Impact, Cutting-Edge Tech:  Immerse yourself in global projects with top-tier clients and stay ahead with cutting-edge technologies. Your skills will shape the future of our industry. Unleash Your Potential:  Develop yourself with VeriPark Academy opportunities;, webinars, and in-house training sessions. Diverse, Vibrant Community:  Be part of a dynamic environment that values diversity and inclusivity. Together Culture:  Even in a remote world, we cultivate connections through engaging face-to-face gatherings as well as online fun events. Special information sharing environment where you can update & align yourself.   Apply now and let's shape the future together.   About VeriPark: We are a global technology company with more than two decades of expertise in the Financial Services industry. Our mission is to enable financial institutions to become digital leaders by delivering world class customer journeys in digital and assisted channels. We develop omni-channel delivery, customer engagement (CRM), branch automation and loan origination solutions based on Microsoft technology (Azure, Dynamics 365, Power Platform) for banks and insurance companies worldwide. With offices in 15 countries from Canada over Europe and the Middle East to Kuala Lumpur, our 900+ colleagues are serving customers in more than 30 countries worldwide. https://www.veripark.com

column2: A Python Trainer is a professional who designs and delivers training programs to educate individuals and teams on the Python programming language and its associated libraries and frameworks. They are responsible for creating and delivering engaging and effective training content that helps learners develop their Python skills.         ?       Responsibilities         Design and develop training programs and curriculum for the Python programming language and its associated libraries and frameworks     Deliver training sessions to individuals and teams, both in-person and online     Create and manage training materials such as presentations, tutorials, and exercises     Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs     Continuously update training materials and curriculum to reflect the latest trends and best practices in Python     Provide one-on-one coaching and mentoring to learners         Requirements         A degree in a relevant field such as computer science, software engineering, or mathematics     Strong understanding of the Python programming language and its associated libraries and frameworks     Experience with data visualization and data analysis using Python libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib     Strong presentation and communication skills     Experience in training and/or teaching     Knowledge of machine learning and deep learning libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras is a plus.       The role of a Python trainer requires a person who is passionate about teaching, has a solid understanding of Python and its associated libraries and frameworks, and has the ability to adapt to the needs of the learners. They must be able to deliver training programs in an engaging and effective way, and must be able to continuously update the training materials to reflect the latest trends and best practices in Python

column2: Description:    Job Title : Enterprise Transformation Coach     Job Requirements    Be an active, involved member of the Enterprise Transformation Coaching team.   o Align local efforts to Transformation goals.   o Participate in Transformation Coaching for one or more business units.   o Provide hands on coaching to teams, programs, and portfolio leaders. column2: All the attributes that we are looking for in an ideal teammate.           Openness     - We welcome people from different backgrounds and schools of thought, Terraformers are open to different perspectives in approaching a solution and not just limit their thoughts or ideas to only a specific domain         Conscientiousness   - We believe in working together for the larger goal and with complete dedication and not just for personal benefits, however, we do not expect    terraformers    to work to the point of burnout.       Humility-    Being humble, grateful and respectful are the core traits of    terraformers   , we do not expect people to agree with every view of the management, feel free to have a different perspective but we always expect it to be put forward with respect       Risk Takers   -    Terraformers    are not afraid of the unknown and are open to new things, not that we encourage extreme risks without weighing the consequences but we are ones who take calculated risks       Autodidacts   -    Terraformers    teach themselves to learn, we do our own research to get solutions, we do not expect you to have a blank slate and figure everything out yourself, we are here to guide you but not handhold and micromanage you.       Self-Actualization   -    Terraformers    are on the path of self-actualization, we are not bothered by the noise and distractions around us, we only work towards achieving our full potential. We do not expect you to over-burden yourself and not have fun but we expect you to work to the best of your capabilities. column2: Job Description: MAAC Kukatpally is seeking a skilled and enthusiastic VFX Faculty to join our academic team. As a VFX Faculty, you will play a crucial role in shaping the careers of aspiring VFX artists. You will be responsible for delivering high-quality instruction in visual effects, engaging students in hands-on projects, and guiding them through their learning journey. Key Responsibilities: Teaching and Curriculum Delivery : Teach VFX courses to students, including but not limited to topics such as compositing, CGI, 3D modeling, texturing, lighting, rigging, and rendering. Software Training : Proficiency in industry-standard software like Adobe After Effects, Premier Pro, Photoshop, Indesign Illisturator  Autodesk Maya, Nuke, Houdini, Cinema 4D, Blender, etc., to train students in their use and application. Practical Projects : Design and guide students through practical projects, ensuring they understand the real-world application of the concepts they learn. Student Mentoring : Mentor and support students, providing guidance on projects, career paths, and industry trends. Assessment and Feedback : Evaluate student progress through assessments, projects, and exams, providing constructive feedback to help them improve. Industry Awareness : Stay updated with the latest trends and developments in the VFX industry, integrating relevant practices into the curriculum. Collaboration and Communication : Work collaboratively with other faculty members to enhance the curriculum and maintain a high standard of education. Professional Development : Participate in faculty meetings, workshops, and professional development activities to keep skills current and maintain a high level of teaching quality. Qualifications and Skills: Educational Background : Bachelor's degree in a related field, such as Animation, Visual Effects, Film Production, or equivalent. Experience : Minimum of 0-5 years of professional experience in the VFX industry or teaching experience in a related field. Technical Proficiency : Strong proficiency in key VFX software applications such as Adobe After Effects, Autodesk Maya, Nuke, Houdini, Cinema 4D, Blender, and others. Communication Skills : Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts in simple terms. Interpersonal Skills : Ability to build rapport with students and colleagues, fostering a positive learning environment. Problem-Solving : Strong problem-solving skills to assist students with technical and creative challenges. Team Player : Willingness to collaborate with other faculty members and contribute to a positive team environment. Benefits: Competitive salary package Professional development opportunities Friendly and dynamic work environment Opportunities for career growth and advancement

column1: GD&T Trainer & Consultant (Full time at Nashik)
column2: Duties and Responsibilities: - Effectively teach GD&T interpretation and application to participants using CADSaga training materials. - Functional understanding of design impacts for common manufacturing processes & common inspection processes and techniques. - Proficiency in delivering online trainings using Microsoft Teams & Zoom platform. - Apply functional GD&T to customer parts and assemblies. - Discuss inter-functional impacts of GD&T application (Design vs. Manufacture vs. Inspection). - A deep understanding of design, development, manufacturing processes, and assembly operations in the automotive or related field. - This is a full time position at CADSaga Nashik Office.  - Travel involved up to 50% of the time, primarily domestic within India. Requirements: - Minimum 3 years GD&T teaching & consulting experience in accordance with ASME Y14.5-2009 or ASME Y14.5-2018 (and/or ISO GPS Standards). - Ability to deliver online and offline (classroom style) training programs. - Dynamic & engaging presentation skills to help participants properly understand GD&T concepts. - Can able to teach Basics of GD&T, Advanced GD&T and Tolerance Stack-up Analysis training programs. - Oversee & innovate the development of new GD&T training materials (GD&T Video trainings, GD&T Blogs, GD&T Presentations, Manuals, and new courses) and enhancements to existing content. - Capable of performing tolerance stack analysis. - Ability to explain and demonstrate manual inspection techniques for geometric tolerances. - Must have hands-on CAD experience on Creo 8.0 and AutoCAD. - Good Knowledge of Microsoft Office: Excel and PowerPoint. - Excellent face-to-face interpersonal communication. Optional Experience and Knowledge for added advantage: - GDTP (Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing Professional): Senior-Level Certification. - Knowledge of ISO Geometric Product Specifications (GPS) Standards. - Some Animation experience in CAD software / PowerPoint.

column2: Diverse Lynx is looking for SAP Security & GRC to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.We are seeking an experienced SAP Security & GRC Specialist to join our IT team. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and managing SAP security measures and GRC processes. This role involves ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of SAP systems while adhering to regulatory compliance and internal policies.     Responsibilities : SAP Security : Design, implement, and manage SAP security roles and authorizations to control access to SAP systems.Conduct regular security audits and assessments to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security policies.Collaborate with SAP functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into secure SAP configurations.     Monitor and respond to security incidents, including conducting investigations and implementing corrective actions.Implement and manage SAP Single Sign-On (SSO) solutions for enhanced access control.Stay updated on the latest SAP security patches and advisories, applying necessary updates promptly.Collaborate with infrastructure and network teams to ensure the secure configuration of SAP systems.GRC (Governance, Risk, and Compliance) : Implement and manage SAP GRC solutions to automate and streamline governance, risk management, and compliance processes.Conduct risk assessments to identify and mitigate potential risks associated with SAP systems.Design and enforce GRC policies and controls to ensure compliance with internal and external regulations.Lead SAP GRC implementation projects, ensuring alignment with business goals and industry best practices.Collaborate with internal audit teams to provide necessary documentation and evidence for SAP-related audits.     Provide expert guidance on GRC-related matters, including policy development and risk mitigation strategies.Documentation and Training : Create and maintain documentation for SAP security and GRC configurations, processes, and best practices.Conduct training sessions for end-users and IT teams on SAP security and GRC policies and procedures.Requirements : Proven experience as an SAP Security & GRC Specialist.In-depth knowledge of SAP security concepts, role design, and authorization administration.     Hands-on experience with SAP GRC solutions (Access Control, Process Control, Risk Management).Strong understanding of regulatory compliance requirements, including SOX, GDPR, and industry-specific standards.Experience with SAP security and GRC in SAP ECC and/or SAP S/4HANA environments.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).SAP Security and GRC certifications are highly desirable.

column2: Develop, own, and drive training and enablement-focused projects and programs for the Sophos Technical Support staff       The Senior Technical Trainers key responsibility is delivering Sophos technical certification to our Support staff     In addition to this, the Senior Technical Trainer will work with colleagues to develop technical training content, occasionally owning a specific course to production while providing feedback on where we can make these courses even better       The Senior Technical Trainer is responsible for creating an onboarding training program for new Technical Support employees globally; Drive training programs to enrich employee professional development, product technical expertise, and continually improving responsiveness and resolution for phone and email customer support cases           What you will do         Deliver high-quality virtual and in-person technical training in line with industry-recognized best practices on Sophos solutions to the Sophos support team.     Lead Instructional Design Programs through development, delivery, and continuous monitoring of training materials to qualify, develop and improve technical knowledge of the support staff.     Design and expand training and development programs based on the need of the organization and the individual.     Develop and retain an up-to-date knowledge of current working practices by periodically spending time working with the operational divisions.     Carry out course monitoring and evaluation by ensuring the collection of completed participants course reports and completing a training report at the end of each event.     Identify technical training and professional development needs within the support organization through job analysis and regular consultation with business managers.     Conduct an annual Training Needs Analysis (TNA) with all teams. Identify barriers to business success and, establish training needs and provide feedback to appropriate managers on any topics falling outside the training remit.     Evaluate options for training delivery to determine the best method to get the outcome needed.         Monitor the KPIs for training issues, including:         training days delivered     cost per training day          Outcomes:         Agent CSATs, agent's retention of the training, agent s ability to answer customers issues and troubleshoot, as applicable     Ensure that all training materials are produced to a professional standard and comply with Company standards. Work closely with the Product Management, Support Readiness, Subject Matter Experts on producing technical training materials.     Create training materials for the usage of various security features and document security measures.     Monitor access and credentials for CloudLabs (Virtual lab environment tool). Test protection features and maintain Sophos Firewalls/UTM within lab environments for creating training materials/providing lab access to Support engineers.      Expertise in managing a variety of security products, including all software and hardware like Anti-Virus, Firewall, URL Filtering, Data Loss Prevention, Remote Ethernet Device (REDs), VPNs, Switches, Zero Trust Network Access and Access points.     Ensure that certified trainers and training facilities are used internally and externally, in line with business and educational objectives.     Mentor other instructors/team leaders/Subject Matter Experts in the content and course delivery techniques for assigned technical courses.     Maintain the quality and consistency of course content throughout a course s life cycle.         What you will bring         5+ years of experience developing content for technical training, computer-based training, and within a formalized training role.     Recent experience building and delivering educational resources, including designing virtualized network training lab environments, administrating LMS systems for reporting, and authoring exams and self-assessment surveys.     Hands-on experience using or teaching Endpoint and Security technologies, including Anti-spam, Anti-Malware, Encryption, and Endpoint securities.     Experience supporting virtual platforms (VMWare, Hyper-V, Xen) or Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google).     Ability to assess technical requirements and propose appropriate solutions.     Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, both spoken and written English; proficiency in additional languages is a plus.     Excellent organizational and time-management abilities.         Whats Great About Sophos         Sophos operates a remote-first working model, making remote work the primary option for most employees. Howe'ver, some roles may necessitate a hybrid approach. Please refer to the location details in our job postings for further information.     Our people - we innovate and create, all of which are accompanied by a great sense of fun and team spirit     Employee-led diversity and inclusion networks that build community and provide education and advocacy     Annual charity and fundraising initiatives and volunteer days for employees to support local communities     Global employee sustainability initiatives to reduce our environmental footprint     Global fitness and trivia competitions to keep our bodies and minds sharp     Global wellbeing days for employees to relax and recharge      Monthly wellbeing webinars and training to support employee health and wellbeing

column2: The position of the Technology Integration specialist is a whole school individual contributor role working across the school. Education - Graduate or Postgraduate  Specific duties and responsibilities of the Whole School technology Integration specialist will include - Create a whole school academic technology policy by discussions with the respective curriculum heads for approval and implementation. Collaborates with teachers in composing effective technology-infused, content-based lessons, and supports the teachers as they implement the lessons in their classrooms. Promotes model instructional practices and the role of technology in them. Articulates appropriate instructional technology practices as described in technology standards for students, and teachers. Provides assistance and training to building instructional staff in the integration of technology to support student achievement. This includes planning and implementing job embedded professional development and workshops for individuals, small groups, and large groups. Collaborates in the evaluation, selection and implementation of instructional technology materials and software. Works with curriculum coordinator to develop and implement technology enhanced curriculum integration projects. Provides leadership in developing and implementing technology plans. Collaborates with Curriculum Heads, Learning centre staff, and other staff to ensure infrastructure and tools are available to carry out school and technology initiatives. Conducts research about advancements in technology tools and resources to inform decision-making. Gathers and disseminates information (e.g., grants, policies, professional development opportunities) relevant to instructional technology. Coordinates technology related grant projects, community outreach projects and fund raisers. Participates in ongoing professional development related to job responsibilities and maintaining expertise in the field. Conducts staff development and supports community awareness initiatives Candidates willing to relocate by themselves can apply.  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Background verification will be carried out for Selected Candidate. (Immediate joining)

column2: We are seeking a dynamic individual to join our team as a      Decision Tree Trainer cum Documentation Specialist.         This role combines expertise in building decision-making trees with a talent for delivering effective training and creating comprehensive documentation. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in training our clients on leveraging our AI-based proctoring and assessment solutions and documenting best practices for decision-making processes.                            ?           Key Responsibilities:                           Develop robust decision-making trees and algorithms to enhance the functionality of our AI-based proctoring and assessment solutions.                                  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product development and customer success, to understand client needs and requirements for decision-making processes.                                  Design and deliver engaging training sessions and workshops for clients to ensure effective utilization of our proctoring and assessment technologies.                                  Create clear and user-friendly documentation, including user guides, manuals, and tutorials, to support clients in implementing and optimizing decision-making processes.                                  Collect feedback from clients and internal stakeholders to continuously improve training materials and documentation based on evolving needs and best practices.                                  Stay informed about industry trends and advancements in decision-making methodologies and incorporate relevant insights into our solutions and training materials.                                Provide ongoing support to clients, addressing inquiries and concerns related to decision-making processes and our proctoring and assessment solutions.                      Qualifications:                           Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, Education, or related field. Advanced degree preferred.              Proven experience in building decision-making trees and designing decision support systems, preferably in the education or assessment industry.              Strong understanding of artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts, with practical experience in applying them to decision-making processes.              Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts clearly and effectively to diverse audiences.             Experience in developing technical documentation, training materials, and user guides.              Detail-oriented with a passion for creating organized and accessible documentation.              Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.                Prior experience in a client-facing role or training capacity is a plus.
column11: Training, Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning, Manager Technology, Technical documentation

column2: As a Partner Training Coordinator at ARCON, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our partners possess the requisite product knowledge and skills to effectively promote and support ARCON's suite of solutions. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing comprehensive training programs tailored to the specific needs of our partners. By collaborating closely with internal teams, you will ensure that our partners are equipped to deliver exceptional service and drive mutual success. Key Responsibilities: Design and develop training programs that cover product features, functionalities, best practices, and sales strategies to empower partners with in-depth knowledge and skills. Create engaging training materials, including presentations, videos, manuals, and online modules, to facilitate effective learning and knowledge retention among partners. Conduct training sessions, workshops, webinars, and seminars for partners, either in-person or virtually, to deliver engaging and informative learning experiences. Assess the effectiveness of training programs through regular evaluations, feedback sessions, and performance metrics analysis to identify areas for improvement and optimization. Collaborate closely with internal stakeholders, including product management, sales, marketing, and customer support teams, to align training initiatives with business objectives and partner needs. Provide ongoing support to partners by addressing their queries, troubleshooting issues, and offering guidance to ensure they have the necessary resources to succeed. Stay abreast of industry trends, product updates, and competitive landscape to continuously enhance training programs and keep partners informed of the latest developments. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Communication, or related field. Strong understanding of cybersecurity concepts, products, and solutions. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. column2: We are in search of facilitators to deliver our amazing virtual/in-person education experiences. We are looking for freelancers to join us. You can work remotely from anywhere in the APAC time zones.      When applying please bear in mind the following:      We work in an area flooded with tech buzzwords (e.g. AI, machine learning, blockchain) in your application show us how you would explain a buzz-wordy term to a room full of people that get it but might have never done it.    We really enjoy videos, and portfolios of work that show us your skills (make it fun)    We deliver training that is technology and innovation focused see if your application can reflect this    This job is hiring on a rolling basis - if you haven't heard back from us in a while, it just means we are waiting for the right educational session to consider you for.      REQUIREMENTS      ESSENTIALS      As a Facilitator at Decoded, youre ultimately accountable for:      Delivering our productised workshops to learners, usually alongside a co-facilitator    Contextualising our varied content to specific clients and sectors    Acting on feedback from peers, learners and the Decoded team    SPECIFIC ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES      Preparation      Reviewing exercises and other learning materials before a session    Learning about your learners and the businesses they work for    Familiarising yourself with the course structure and content, proactively filling gaps in your knowledge    Self assessing your skills and taking up suitable training and professional development opportunities      Delivery      Delivering a 10/10 learning experience in each workshop    Communicating complex data science concepts and techniques with energy, focus and patience    Engaging and captivating the attention of a room of busy working professionals    Collaborating with your co-facilitator to give each session a consistent and balanced pace and tone    Handling and resolving challenging learning moments with learners    Facilitating the learning journey for your audience, and leaving no-one behind whilst also providing stimulation for advanced learners    Enabling an inclusive, collaborative and respectful learning environment      When in-person: Setup and wrap up      Collecting and returning equipment from Decodeds offices when required    Preparing the learning environment: room setup, laptop setup, distributing materials and other tasks as required    Working with the Decoded Operations team to ensure the learning environment reaches our high standards    Submitting written feedback to our Product and Operations teams to enable constant improvements to the content and logistics of each workshop      WHO ARE YOU?      You are comfortable public speaking and educating any audience from teenagers to CEOs. You are confident in your skills at communicating data, coding or cybersecurity-related sessions. You are in love with technology and learning.      Pan India

column2: Bringle Academy Machine Learning Intern       Stop Thinking Keep Bringling !!     Bringle is the largest travel site in the world.  We get millions of unique visitors on a monthly basis.     Do you want to apply your machine learning expertise to find solutions for the largest travel site on the web? Do you get excited about the prospect of working with not just big data,  but huge data? Would you like to work across diverse areas including personalization,  fraud detection,  and natural language processing?    Bringle Academy s  Machine Learning team to works on machine learning and statistical analysis problems across several groups in the company.  As a member of this group you ll use these techniques to implement new solutions and improve existing approaches to large scale data analysis.  You ll be relied upon to research,  design,  and implement your projects.  You must be comfortable communicating your approach to project managers across the company.        Responsibilities               Working with Hadoop,  Redshift,  and other big data systems      Applying machine learning techniques to personalize the site experience for our users    Building algorithms to help our review fraud team catch bad guys    Working on various classification and regression problems over our huge database of traveller reviews and site data     Requirements               Working towards a Bachelors or Master s Degree in Computer Science,  Computer Engineering,  Math or a related field.  Advanced degree preferred.    A passion for solving real world problems with machine learning   Experience working with collaborative filtering,  clustering,  classification,  regression,  and/ or statistical modeling.    Knowledge of Hadoop,  Hive,  Redshift or other big data tools   Knowledge and experience of SQL and relational databases   Fluency with statistical tools such as R or Python scikit-learn   Proficiency in Java or C    Strong computer science fundamentals (data structures and complexity)

column2: Looking for highly skilled and experienced Programming/Data Structure Trainer .      The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering training on programming languages such as C, C++, Java and Data Structures to a diverse group of students in a classroom setting.            Key Responsibilities:              A Programming/Data Structures trainer is responsible for training students on the concepts of programming and data structures. This includes topics such as Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object-oriented programming.      The trainer should also train students on the practical implementation of data structures.        Design and deliver engaging training sessions on programming languages such as C, C++, Java, and Data Structures.        Create and maintain training materials, including lesson plans, presentations, and assessments.        Monitor student progress and provide feedback and support to ensure student success.        Collaborate with other trainers to ensure consistency in training and to share best practices.            Qualifications:              This is a full-time position, and the trainer will be expected to work with a diverse set of students including those with varying levels of programming experience.      The trainer will be expected to be up-to-date with the latest developments in programming and data structures and be familiar with a variety of programming languages.        Experience in Data Structures and programming languages (C/C++/Java).        Strong background in computer science and experience of training and mentoring students.        Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and simple way.        Strong organisational and time management skills.        Ability to work independently and as part of a team.        Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.            Education:            B.E. / B.Tech. / MCA / MSc-IT / MSc-CS / M.Tech / PhD.

column2: Technical Trainer will be responsible for providing product training and    support to employees and other learners.      The trainer is responsible for    developing and delivering product training and workshops to ensure that users    understand the features and functions of the products.      Primary Roles and Responsibilities      a) Manages entire product training lifecycle: TNA - Content Creation-    Implementation - Delivery - Tracking - PTB analysis & Improvement.      b) Developing a Product training plan in collaboration with relevant    stakeholders      c) Creation and maintenance of training Process and Communication      d) Carrying out Training Need Identification exercise annually to    defining a baseline and improve benchmarks.      e) Continuously collaborate with the product development team to learn    the product and be always up to date with the product life cycle.      f) Develop and maintain training content and course materials as per the    training needs and product updates      g) Deliver training to develop adequate knowledge and skills needed for    learners to effectively use the product      h) Work closely with the subject matter experts to develop, deliver and    manage relevant product trainings      i) Update and Upkeep training manuals & handbooks to enable standard    training processes and delivery.      j) Monitor the progress of learners who have completed the training,    carry out assessments and provide follow-up support as needed      k) Collaborate with other departments to ensure learner and customer    satisfaction      l) Monitor feedback and develop strategies for addressing issues.      m) Stay up to date on the latest technologies and industry trends      Job Specifications      a) Proven experience as a technical trainer in Enterprise Data Management    domain or Data Management Solutions or fintech product enterprise      b) Knowledge of instructional design and content development      c) Understanding of Training Assessments & Review process      d) Experience in Program management will be an added advantage. column2: Develop training programs and materials focused on Aerospace & Aeronautical technical publications, ensuring they are up-to-date, accurate, and aligned with industry standards and regulations.                     Deliver training sessions to employees and stakeholders, both in a classroom setting and through virtual platforms, covering topics such as manual interpretation, document navigation, and compliance with aeronautical technical publication guidelines.                     Assess the training needs of different departments and individuals within the organization, tailoring training programs to meet specific requirements.                     Stay informed about the latest advancements, trends, and regulations in aeronautical technical publications and incorporate relevant updates into training programs.                     Provide guidance and support to employees and stakeholders regarding the interpretation and usage of aeronautical technical publications, resolving any questions or issues that may arise.                     Collaborate with subject matter experts, instructional designers, and other trainers to continuously improve training materials and delivery methods.                     Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through assessments, feedback, and performance metrics, making necessary adjustments to ensure desired outcomes are achieved.                     Maintain accurate records of training activities, including attendance, evaluations, and certifications.                     Stay updated on industry best practices, standards, and technological advancements related to Aerospace & Aeronautical technical publications, sharing knowledge and insights with the team.               Requirements               Bachelor's degree in Aeronautical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, Aviation Management, or a related field. A combination of relevant education and work experience may be considered         .                     Minimum of one year of experience in aerospace training, preferably working with students.                     Extensive knowledge and experience in Aerospace & Aeronautical technical publications, including familiarity with manuals, procedures, and documentation used in the aviation industry.                     In-depth knowledge of aerospace engineering principles, aircraft systems, and industry standards.                     Strong understanding of regulatory requirements and standards governing aeronautical technical publications, such as FAA regulations or equivalent international regulations.                     Excellent training and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex information to diverse audiences.                     In-depth knowledge of aerospace engineering principles, aircraft systems, and industry standards.                     Strong presentation and communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner.                     Experience in developing and delivering training programs for students, utilizing interactive teaching methods.                     Patience, empathy, and the ability to adapt teaching strategies to accommodate different learning styles.                     Excellent organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple training sessions and student cohorts.                     Passion for mentoring and developing the next generation of aerospace professionals.                     Familiarity with educational technologies and tools for blended or online learning is a plus.                     Professional certifications or teaching qualifications in the field of aerospace or education are an advantage.

column2: As a Drone Instructor, you will be responsible for teaching and training individuals or groups on the safe and effective operation of drones      Your role will involve designing and delivering educational programs, developing training materials, conducting practical flight training sessions, and ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and guidelines      You will play a crucial role in imparting knowledge and skills to drone enthusiasts, hobbyists, or professionals seeking to enhance their capabilities              Key Responsibilities:          Curriculum Development: Develop comprehensive training curricula for drone operation, including theoretical knowledge and practical skills required for safe and efficient flying.      Training Delivery: Conduct engaging and informative drone training sessions, both in-classroom and in-field, to educate participants on drone technology, flight principles, regulations, and best practices.      Flight Training: Provide hands-on flight instruction, demonstrating flight techniques, maneuvers, and emergency procedures to ensure trainees develop competency in piloting drones safely and effectively.      Safety and Compliance: Instruct participants on safety protocols, risk assessment, airspace restrictions, and compliance with local laws and regulations governing drone operations.      Equipment Maintenance: Oversee the maintenance and calibration of training drones and related equipment to ensure their proper functionality and availability for training sessions.      Evaluation and Feedback: Assess trainees progress through practical evaluations and written exams, provide constructive feedback, and address areas for improvement.      Industry Updates: Stay updated on the latest developments, regulations, and trends in the drone industry, and integrate relevant information into training programs.      Customer Support: Assist trainees with troubleshooting technical issues, answering questions, and providing ongoing support after training sessions.      Documentation: Maintain accurate records of training activities, attendance, and participant performance, and generate reports as required.      Continuous Learning: Engage in professional development activities to enhance personal knowledge and skills related to drones, training methodologies, and instructional techniques.          Qualifications:          Bachelors degree in a relevant field or equivalent practical experience.      Proven experience in operating drones and a thorough understanding of drone technology, flight principles, and regulations.      Demonstrated instructional or training experience, preferably in a technical or aviation-related field.      Proficiency in developing training materials, including presentations, handouts, and assessments.      Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey complex information in a clear and understandable manner.      Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to interact with individuals of diverse backgrounds and skill levels.      Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining high standards of safety and professionalism.      Familiarity with drone flight simulators and software used for flight planning and data analysis is an advantage.      Relevant certifications such as Part 107 Remote Pilot Certificate or equivalent licenses are desirable.

column2: Position Title: Network Trainer Job Description: Overview: As a Network Trainer at Elxer, you will have a dual responsibility of designing and delivering training programs focused on telecom network technologies and recruiting suitable candidates to undergo these training programs. Your role is pivotal in ensuring that our workforce is equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel in network engineering and technical support roles within the telecommunications industry. Job Location: Mumbai, Raipur Key Responsibilities: Recruitment: Develop and implement recruitment strategies to attract candidates with the potential to succeed in telecom network engineering and technical support roles. Conduct initial screenings and interviews to assess candidates' technical aptitude, communication skills, and suitability for training programs. Training Program Development: Design comprehensive training programs tailored to the telecom sector, covering network architecture, protocols, technologies, and best practices. Collaborate with subject matter experts to develop curriculum materials, lab exercises, and simulations that reflect real-world telecom network environments and challenges. Ensure training programs align with industry standards, emerging technologies, and Elxer's business objectives in the telecom sector. Training Delivery: Deliver engaging and interactive training sessions to educate employees on telecom-specific network concepts, including wireless networks, fiber optics, IP networking, and telecommunications protocols. Utilize a variety of instructional methods, including lectures, demonstrations, group discussions, and hands-on labs, to facilitate effective learning and skill development. Provide individualized coaching and support to address trainees' learning needs and reinforce key telecom network concepts. Technical Support Readiness: Prepare employees for technical support roles by equipping them with troubleshooting skills, customer interaction best practices, and incident management procedures relevant to telecom network environments. Conduct practical exercises and simulations to simulate technical support scenarios and assess trainees' readiness to handle network-related issues effectively. Performance Evaluation: Establish objective criteria and metrics for evaluating trainees' understanding of telecom network technologies and their ability to apply knowledge in practical scenarios. Conduct regular assessments, quizzes, and practical exams to measure trainees' progress and identify areas for improvement. Provide constructive feedback and performance reviews to trainees to support their professional development in the telecom sector. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on advancements in telecom network technologies, industry trends, and best practices in technical training and development. Solicit feedback from trainees and stakeholders to identify opportunities for enhancing the effectiveness and relevance of training programs. Collaborate with internal teams to incorporate feedback, iterate on training materials, and implement improvements to the training curriculum and delivery methods. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience in technical training and development, with expertise in network engineering and technical support roles. Strong understanding of network infrastructure, protocols, and technologies, including TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VLANs, VPNs, and firewall configurations. Experience in network design, implementation, maintenance, and troubleshooting in enterprise environments. Excellent presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts clearly and effectively. Proficiency in instructional design methodologies, curriculum development, and adult learning principles. Certifications such as CCNA, CompTIA Network+, or equivalent are highly desirable. Prior experience in technical recruitment or talent acquisition is advantageous.
column11: CCNA, Network Engineering, network training, Technical Training, firewall training

column2: A computer science teacher is responsible for instructing students in the field of computer science and technology      They typically work in middle schools, high schools, or colleges and universities, educating students on various aspects of computer science, including programming languages, algorithms, data structures, computer networks, software development, and computer hardware      The job description of a computer science teacher may include the following responsibilities:Lesson Planning: Designing and developing lesson plans, instructional materials, and activities to meet the learning objectives of the curriculum      Classroom Instruction: Delivering engaging and effective lectures, demonstrations, and presentations to teach computer science concepts and skills to students      Curriculum Development: Participating in the development and evaluation of computer science curriculum, ensuring alignment with educational standards and industry best practices      Practical Assignments: Assigning and assessing practical projects, coding exercises, and assignments to help students apply their knowledge and develop problem-solving skills      Assessment and Grading: Evaluating student performance through exams, quizzes, projects, and homework assignments, providing timely feedback and assigning grades      Individualized Instruction: Providing one-on-one assistance and guidance to students who need extra support or have specific learning needs      Classroom Management: Maintaining a positive and organized learning environment, managing student behavior, and enforcing classroom rules and policies      Technology Integration: Incorporating educational technology tools, software, and online resources into teaching practices to enhance student learning experiences      Mentorship and Guidance: Offering academic and career guidance to students interested in pursuing further studies or careers in computer science and related fields
column11: Computer science, Computer hardware, Coding, Curriculum development, Programming, Manager Technology, Data structures, Management, Computer networking, Teaching

column2: Future and Beyond Consulting and Technologies Pvt Ltd is looking for Cloud Computing Trainer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.      Curriculum Development: Designing and developing training materials, courses, and curricula that cover a wide range of cloud computing topics, including cloud service providers (eg, AWS, Azure, GCP), cloud architecture, security, and best practices      Training Delivery: Conducting training sessions, workshops, and classes to educate individuals, teams, or organizations on cloud computing concepts, technologies, and practical implementation      Content Delivery: Utilizing various teaching methods, such as lectures, hands-on labs, case studies, and real-world scenarios to ensure a comprehensive understanding of cloud computing concepts      Customization: Tailoring training programs to the specific needs and objectives of the target audience, whether they are beginners, IT professionals, or business executives      Hands-On Experience: Providing hands-on training to give participants practical experience with cloud platforms and tools      Technology Updates: Staying current with the latest developments in cloud computing and related technologies to incorporate relevant updates into training materials      Assessment and Evaluation: Assessing the knowledge and skills of participants, and providing feedback and performance evaluations to track progress      Problem Solving: Assisting participants in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud deployments and configurations      Certification Preparation: Preparing students for cloud certification exams offered by cloud service providers (eg, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator, Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect)      Consultation: Offering consultancy and guidance on cloud adoption strategies, migration plans, and cost optimization          Qualifications          Cloud Expertise: In-depth knowledge and experience in cloud computing platforms and services provided by major cloud providers (eg, AWS, Azure, GCP)      Certifications: Holding relevant cloud certifications from service providers is often highly desirable and helps establish credibility as a cloud computing trainer      Teaching Skills: Strong presentation and teaching skills, including the ability to explain complex technical concepts in a clear and understandable manner

What you will need:          Collaborate with the internal team to plan training schedules with due consideration of available training capacity and ensure that these schedules will support the completion of public course schedules and private client requirements on schedule and with high quality.      Communicate effectively to internal audiences the status of course development, readiness, schedules, and client progress. Maintain subject matter expertise through ongoing learning and personal development. Meet or exceed established course feedback/satisfaction scores.      Required Experience Qualifications      Scrum Trainer - Certification from Industry recognized organization.      Two full years of experience as a Scrum Master.      Substantive experience as an Agile Practitioner working to deliver many large software products/projects. Substantive experience working on software projects that had complex functional requirements, time-sensitive schedules, and diverse stakeholder communities.      Additional in-depth experience using the more general Agile techniques, including test-driven development, continuous integration, pair programming, refactoring, and cross-functional teams.      Minimum of two full years of experience as a formal training instructor, training experienced software practitioners in the use of Agile methodology and techniques.      Skilled at differing training modalities including experiential exercises, learning games, simulations, process miniatures, and self-paced learning.      Experience planning, preparing, and delivering training in a structured environment, including an agenda, schedule, objectives, training aids, class exercises, and class discussion periods.      Experience working as a Scrum Product Owner Highly polished presentation skills, both in planning and delivery      Experience in recommending, presenting, and documenting possible innovations in techniques and practices applicable to Agile, the Scrum roles, organizational change, individual change, facilitated learning, leadership, etc.      At least 5 years of direct experience using Agile techniques in software development.      Five years of experience should include experience in the pragmatic application of generally accepted Agile techniques to real-world situations to suit varying requirements, conditions, and constraints.      Must maintain the ability to hold certification as Scrum Trainer.
column11: Training delivery, continuous integration, Training Instructor, Agile, Scrum, Agile methodology, test driven development, HR, Subject matter expertise, Team building

Job Responsibilities:     - Responsible for calling Insurance companies (in US) on behalf of doctors/physicians and follow up on outstanding Accounts Receivable   - To prioritize the pending claims for calling from the aging basket   - Should be able to convince the claims company (payers) for payment of their outstanding claims.   - To check the appropriateness of the insurance information given by the patient if it is inadequate or unclear.   - To make a physical call by following the international norms and applicable rules for confidentiality and HIPAA compliance   - Escalate difficult collection situations to management in a timely manner.   - Review provider claims that have not been paid by insurance companies   - Handling patient s billing queries and updating their account information.   - Work on over 20 days work file.   - Post cash and write off the contractual adjustments accordingly while working on the accounts.   - Meeting daily/weekly and monthly targets set for an individual.    - In case the patient does not have sufficient insurance coverage for the medical procedure or if the patient is in any way not eligible for coverage, transfer the outstanding balance to the patient.    - In case the claim has already been paid by the insurance company, request insurance company/ TPA to send EOB (Explanation of Benefits) through fax/ mail.   - Should have basic knowledge of the entire Revenue Cycle Management (RCM)   -
